TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClearDatabaseSchemaIfModelChanges`1<(class System.Data.Entity.DbContext) TContext> extends Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Mobile.Service.ClearDatabaseSchemaAlways`1<!TContext>
Public Class ClearDatabaseSchemaIfModelChanges(Of TContext) Inherits ClearDatabaseSchemaAlways(Of TContext)
type ClearDatabaseSchemaIfModelChanges<'Context (requires 'Context :> DbContext)> = class inherit ClearDatabaseSchemaAlways<'Context (requires 'Context :> DbContext)>

Docs.summary: An implementation of that will DELETE all resources (e.g. tables, views, functions, and procedures) within a given database schema, and optionally re-seed the database only if the model has changed since the database was created. This implementation of is useful if the current user only has permission to access resources within a particular database schema and not the entire database.
Docs.remarks: Whether or not the model has changed is determined by the method. To seed the database create a derived class and override the Seed method.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the that will DELETE all resources from the default schema derived from the service name in case the model has changed.

Docs.param: The schema to DELETE all resources from in case the model has changed.
